segments.text: John , my father isn't there at all . Are you kidding ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cool , fellow , what's the date today , buddy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's ... oh it's the 1st April , April Fool's Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You forgot all of about it , didn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2
